links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} (-1)^(n-k)*n!/k!*binomial(n-1, k-1)*k^(k-1). a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n} Stirling1(n, k)*A058863(k). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Sep 17 2003a(n) ~ n^(n-1) * (1-exp(-1))^(n+1/2). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 27 2012
prog: (PARI) { for (n=0, 100, f=n!; a=sum(k=1, n, (-1)^(n - k)*f/k!*binomial(n - 1, k - 1)*k^(k - 1)); write("b060356.txt", n, " ", a); ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 04 2009]
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Apr 01 2001
